name: Castles & Krakens
description:
Delve into the fantasy world of Castles & Krakens!

Join your brother and friends as you enter the tabletop world of his newly purchased board game. You will meet various characters, travel through a number of cities each with it's own seasonal environment, and fight against creatures such as zombies, wolves and giant insects.

Castles & Krakens is a serious game which is based upon real-world topics and data such as gender identity, and social stigmas. Themes of equality and sexism are conveyed while pushing the idea that gender does not play a part in the competence of a person.

The player will gather a team of diverse personalities and rise against the stereotypical patriarchy in a vibrant, fantasy world.

As an alpha-version concept, our game has some incomplete sections and bugs that may be found by diligent players.

Thank you!


Presented by Team Cloud Kraken Project Manager & Lead Designer

Nichelle Nolan (http://charligal.itch.io/)
